::Zardus::

Zardus keeps his arms off the table as the energy streams rush through 
it. He calmly listens to Ominous' words. Zardus knew the bot was 
playing on his ego, but Ominous did seem to know what he was talking 
about.

"The Maximals are currently being neutralized by my forces," Zardus 
says, thinking Ominous's offer over. "I'll have to discuss it with the 
rest of the Alliance."

Unlike some of the Predacon leaders, Zardus knew that without his 
team's support he wouldn't have any power, and forcing them to extract 
their sparks could really put a flaw in that support.

"But your plan leads to the destruction of yourself and all of us as 
well," the Alliance commander points out, "Without the Autobots and 
the Decepticons, the Predacons and Maximals wouldn't exist, therefore 
me and my team wouldn't exist either. I'm not totaly sure about your 
history, but I'm fairly sure that it had something to do with the 
Predacons. If that part of your past is deleted, things might turn out 
very differently."
